title.narrative: Agroforestry Landscapes and Sustainable Forest Management that Generate Environmental and Economic Benefits Globally and Locally

description.narrative: 1. Strengthened local and national governance for the dry-humid biological corridor with emphasis on PAs and production systems to contribute to the conservation of biodiversity and its sustainable use,2. Generation of environmental, social, and economic benefits for communities through sustainable land management and rehabilitation of corridors to increase connectivity between PAs and production landscapes,3. Establishing supply chain initiatives to increase income of farmers derived from coffee, cocoa, sustainable agroforestry, and ecosystem services,4. Knowledge management and monitoring and evaluation (ME),Project Management Cost

participating-org.narrative: Secretary of Energy, Natural Resources, Environment and Mining (MiAmbiente)
